description: This table contains the Surgical Staff Times information for the Surgical Log (ORL).

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the Line (ORM) record

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: STAFF_ST_DOCU_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the EMP user who documented this staff member's start time.

columns.name: STAFF_ET_DOCU_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the EMP user who documented this staff member's start time.

columns.name: STAFF_TIME_SOURCE_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The source and status of the start and end time for the provider.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Manual/Active


RTLS/Active


RTLS/Denied


RTLS/Raw Event


RTLS/Unresolved


Manual/PageRespond
